entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thundershowers in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 15 May 2016
